refnamediv.refpurpose: Call a user function given by the first parameter

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Call a user defined function given by the function parameter. Take the following:

informalexample.programlisting:
<?php
function barber($type) {
    echo "You wanted a $type haircut, no problem";
}
call_user_func('barber', "mushroom");
call_user_func('barber', "shave");
?>

refsect1.para: Object methods may also be invoked statically using this function by passing array($objectname, $methodname) to the function parameter.

informalexample.programlisting:
<?php
class myclass {
  function say_hello() {
    echo "Hello!\n";
  }
}

$classname = "myclass";

call_user_func(array($classname, 'say_hello'));
?>

refsect1.para: See also: is_callable, call_user_func_array, call_user_method, call_user_method_array.
